mapper.select: select aExam.id, aExam.name, aExam.score, bExam.id as sonId, bExam.name as sonName, bExam.score as sonScore from aa_exam_score_info aExam LEFT JOIN aa_exam_score_info bExam on aExam.id = bExam.parent_id where aExam.parent_id = '0' ORDER BY aExam.sort,bExam.sort;

select class.id, class.score, info.name, detail.id as sonId, detail.score as sonScore, detailInfo.name as sonName from aa_exam_score_classify class left join aa_exam_score_info info on info.id = class.exam_score_info_id left join aa_exam_score_detail detail on detail.score_classify_id = class.id left join aa_exam_score_info detailInfo on detailInfo.id = detail.score_info_id
AND class.exam_id = #{examId}
